Articles.Content: hey i need your help, i have been having an issue with USI reactorpack, when i load the game it simply stops loading on the 1.25 nuke reactor. The only solution i have found is removing the folder, but i would still like the reactors for my ships, you think you could help? I have been troubleshooting all day and nothing.... is there any mods that are incompatible or something? It started when i installed karbonite and karbonite plus, bearing in mind i also installed all of the near future mods at the same time, does anyone know a fix?
